1.10.1.changelog:
• Make Okovision International by adding English language (default)
  • For changing Language, go to parameters menu
  • This is the last update for the coming months !
  • Next version will be Okovision V2

1.11.2.changelog:
• Update with PHP 8 Compatibility, including install steps for Linux (Raspbian 12)
  • Add Bug fix for 0 degres issue when Boiler gets turned off.

1.12.1.changelog:
• Reactivate auto update functionality by redirecting to this repository
  • Updates Highstock to latest version.
  • Fix mobile scrolling bug onto graphs.
  • Fix a bug preventing some data to be displayed in real time mode.
  • Made install easier with new script for Linux and filling in some standard info in the setup (database path and login)

1.12.4.changelog:
• Fix the bugged values issue when the heater gets shutdown.
  • Implement a new page for generating SQL dumps of the database (Parameters > Import/Export SQL Base).
  • Importing another SQL dump file is not possible through Okovision_2023 yet for security reasons, you might want to do it in command line mode.
  • Improve text visibility in history tab (police was too small.

1.12.5.changelog:
• Update setup and parameters pages.
  • Fix bug on SQL backup page preventing from generating a dump.

1.12.6.changelog:
• Add 'running' icon for the dump generation.
  • Fix bug in setup page which prevented from saving new values.

1.12.7.changelog: • Fix a bug preventing the system to update when a file was empty on the heater logs.

1.13.0.changelog:
• Devlopper comment: I fixed several issues and added an analytics functionality. The purpose is to get anonymous information to know the number of installations.⚠️ You can disable the analytics, but this helps me understand if I need to spend time improving the tool for other people.Thank you all for your support.
  • Add Statistics to improve Okovision. This functionality will send anonymous data to an API, including : Random Installation ID, Okovision version, PHP version, date of registration, last alive date. You can disable this functionality and delete your installation id in the parameter page.
  • Improve some texts for more clarity
  • Fixed an issue causing an error on installations without Hot water.
  • Improve password change that wasn't asking for the old password (will update the password encryption for the next update)
  • Add some new fields into the config.php
  • Improve install process for Linux systems to make sure all packages are properly installed
  • Automatic reset DEBUG to false during the update in case people forgot.
  • Remove obsolete ZIP calls to new PHP 8 versions (make sure to update to PHP 8.0 minimum).
